MAN.TITLE: IN_f
MAN.SHORT_DESCRIPTION: Scicos Super Block regular input port

DESCRIPTION.P: This block must only be used inside Scicos Super Blocks to represent a regular input port. The input size is determined by the context.
In a Super Block, regular input ports must be numbered from 1 to the number of regular input ports.

ITEMIZE.label: DIALOGUE PARAMETERS
ITEMIZE.ITEM: : an integer giving the port number.
